Pep Guardiola claims he will decide Joe Hart 's future at the end of the season. 
Hart has appeared to rule out a return to Manchester City when his loan spell ends in the summer and is resigned to finding another club because he does not feel part of Guardiola's plans. 
Guardiola insists he has not made any decision regarding Hart and will resolve his future when the campaign is over. 
"I said many times, we will explain at the end of the season all the cases," said the City boss. Pep Guardiola poses with the Manager of the Month award (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
"We have players here, the players who are happy, the players who are unhappy and the players who are not involved. 
"Joe is a player for Manchester City and I'm going to decide at the end of the season." 
Hart does not appear to have a future at City and Guardiola has said he would be prepared to stick with Willy Caballero and Claudio Bravo next season. poll loading Where will Manchester City finish this season? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
